intro: Portenschlagia, commonly known as the blue-eyed grass, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Iridaceae. It is native to southern Africa, where it thrives in rocky and arid environments. Portenschlagia species are popular in horticulture for their ornamental value and ability to bloom in full sun.
